entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:06 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 09:49 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: ENE 29 km/h gust 44 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of thundershowers this afternoon. Fog patches developing this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming light this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
